title: New Rengar skin RIOT pliz
body: I really think {{champion:107}}  should get a new skin.....just saying I mean RIOT is giving skins to champs that already have 4 or more skins.......which is pretty unfare (just saying)..........it's just a thought RIOT (pliz get Rengar a new skin)

replies.body: Yeah, Zac has ONE skin. at least rengar has 2...
black panther rengar with black fur and white amour would look really nice. maybe jungle rengar with animal skins since he is a hunter a spin off of nidalee renagr style
Dandy chose rangar for the samsung white skin dude you will get one soon{{champion:107}}

Rengar got Night Hunter about 9 months ago, and he still may have a Samsung White skin coming up. If anyone needs a skin, its Zac, Jayce, Zed and many more. 

I for one wouldn't mind seeing a new skin for Swain, the supposedly 'Dragonmaster Swain'.

Project: Rengar Skin 
would be awesome he would pull his mask down when he ults 
His E would look like a laser bola 
W Would look Red 
His Knife would be a laser knife and his claw would be either laser or Iron

and Surprise Party Rengar
Streamers for e
Confetti when he jumps or W
They should give him one that looks like Zac.
